TopicTitle: Help creating suspention for landing legs with multiple legs.

Articles.Content:
I am creating a stack landing gear with multiple legs but I can't get the suspension work.

I think the problems has to do with suspensionTransformName and/or PistonsTransform and/or landingFootName, since I can't rename the parts in unity without losing the animation and meshes can't have the same name in blender.
Try looking at this hope it helps http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/77991-Tutorial-Animated-Landing-Leg-w-Suspension?p=1120473.
